code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant Upstream
    participant agent-client-relationships
    participant Database
    participant agent-assurance
    participant des

    Upstream->>+agent-client-relationships: POST /api/:arn/invitation
    agent-client-relationships->>Database: Read: Check for pending invitations.
    agent-client-relationships->>+agent-assurance: GET /agent-assurance/agent-details/:arn
    agent-assurance-->>-agent-client-relationships: Response
    agent-client-relationships->>+des: GET /registration/business-details/... or /vat/customer/vrn/...
    des-->>-agent-client-relationships: Response
    agent-client-relationships->>Database: Read: Check for active relationship.
    agent-client-relationships->>Database: Read: Check for partial-auth relationship (Groupware_WikiPage).
    agent-client-relationships->>Database: Create: Create new invitation.
    agent-client-relationships-->>-Upstream: Final Response
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，Read: Check for pending invitations.、Read: Check for active relationship.有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Read: Check for partial-auth relationship (Groupware_WikiPage).、Create: Create new invitation.？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Read: Check for partial-auth relationship (Groupware_WikiPage).、Create: Create new invitation.就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Read: Check for partial-auth relationship (Groupware_WikiPage).、Create: Create new invitation.。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Read: Check for partial-auth relationship (Groupware_WikiPage).、Create: Create new invitation.完成整个流程。
